references.paper_title: The topological structure of scaling limits of large planar maps
references.reason: This paper establishes the homeomorphism between the scaling limit of large planar maps and the 2-dimensional sphere, a crucial result for understanding the topology of the Brownian sphere.

references.paper_title: Uniqueness and universality of the Brownian map
references.reason: This paper proves the uniqueness and universality of the Brownian map, providing a strong foundation for the study of the Brownian sphere as a universal scaling limit.

references.paper_title: The Brownian map is the scaling limit of uniform random plane quadrangulations
references.reason: This paper establishes the Brownian map as the scaling limit of uniform random plane quadrangulations, providing an important connection between random planar maps and the Brownian sphere.

references.paper_title: Planar maps are well labeled trees
references.reason: This paper introduces the Cori-Vauquelin-Schaeffer (CVS) bijection, a fundamental tool in the construction of the Brownian sphere from the Brownian snake.
